VariableDescription.Name: Status__C3_PP_DWP
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         STSP Cluster>Solar Terrestrial Science Programme, Cluster

#                                     Status[0]= 1 = Use with caution
#                                     Status[0]= 2 = OK
#                                     Status[0]= 255 = Not Supplied
#     SOURCE_NAME                     C1>Cluster spacecraft 1
#     DATA_TYPE                       PP>Prime Parameter
#     DESCRIPTOR                      DWP>Digital Wave Processor
#     DATA_VERSION                    01
#     TITLE                           Electron modulation significance>spin scan interval
#     TEXT                            L. J. C. Woolliscroft et al, The Digital Wave-Processing Experiment on Cluster
#                                     Space Sci. Rev., 79,  pp 209 - 231, 1997)
#     MODS                            Produced in accordance with CSDS file specification
#                                     Reference Document for CSDS CDF File Design, DS-QMW-TN-0003
#                                     Operational version of UKCDHF Pipeline software

#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 C3_PP_DWP_00000000_V01

#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Cluster Spacecraft 3, DWP Prime Parameters
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Cluster
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     PI_NAME                         H. Alleyne
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  Univ-Sheff
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 Refer to CSDS for rules of acknowledgement
#     GENERATED_BY                    Generated by UK CDHF
#     GENERATION_DATE                 2003-02-12T10:49:58.000Z
#     INST_MODE                       C3>DWP>0>2000-11-01T00:00:03.313000Z>DWP_WEC_NOT_EXE>Macro not exe (STDBY)
#     PARENTS                         RDM>0012081A
#                                     RDM>0012091A
#                                     RDM>0012101A
#     RULES_OF_USE                    Refer to CSDS for rules of use
#     SKELETON_VERSION                CSDS_CDF_V2.3
#     INST_SETTINGS                   TO BE OVERWRITTEN

#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Cluster
#     LINK_TEXT                       High resolution Cluster data from the
#     LINK_TITLE                      Cluster Science Archive

#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VMO/NumericalData/Cluster-Samba/DWP/PrimeParameter/PT4S
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#

#  2. DWP status Corr
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 17:48:33 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
EPOCH                                STATUS[0]              STATUS[1]              STATUS[2]              STATUS[3]              STATUS[4]
                                (@_Status[0]_)         (@_Status[1]_)         (@_Status[2]_)         (@_Status[3]_)         (@_Status[4]_)

01-11-2000 00:00:03.313                      1                      0                      0                      0                      0
